title: Calendar | Student Financial Aid and Scholarships | University of Illinois at Chicago

Student Financial Aid and Scholarships     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Student Financial Aid and Scholarships      Student Financial Aid and Scholarships   Main Menu    Cost           Cost of Attendance (COA)    Estimating EFC    Financial Need    Paying Your Bill         Financial Aid Steps           Illinois RISE Act    Eligibility    Apply    Verification    Financial Aid Notification    Payment    Summer Financial Aid    SAP Policy & Appeal    Special Circumstances    Rights & Responsibilities    Withdrawing vs. Reducing Hours    FERPA    Calendar         Types of Aid           Grants    Scholarships    Waivers & Assistantships    Loans    Student Employment    Study Abroad    Veterans    Pre-paid Tuition         Forms           2019-2020 Forms    2020-2021 Forms         FAQ           Glossary of Terms    Contact Us         Consumer Information           Academic Programs    Department of Education Complaint Process    Financial Aid Information    Semester Withdrawals    General Institutional Information    Health, Safety and Security    Intercollegiate Athletic Program Participation Rates and Financial Support Data    Student Outcomes    Voter Registration    Notice of Availability of Institutional and Financial Aid Information    Contact Information for Assistance in Obtaining Institutional or Financial Aid Information          Eyebrow menu    Scholarships    UIC Connection    Student Affairs    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search                      Calendar      View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Student Financial Aid and Scholarships    Financial Aid Steps    Calendar           SFAS Calendar   Students are responsible for reviewing the financial aid calendar and deadlines. Due to federal, state and institutional regulations, if the required paperwork is not submitted by the posted deadlines, students will be ineligible to receive assistance and responsible for any outstanding bill for that term.      2020 SFAS Calendar        2020 SFAS Calendar       January 2020      03  First financial aid disbursement of Spring 2020    06  First refund of Spring 2020    13  Classes begin for spring 2020 semester    24  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class for spring 2020    February 2020      15  Priority FAFSA filing deadline 2020-2021– students who submit by this date will receive full consideration for all state and institutional grants    28  Spring 2020 bill due in full for students without payment plans    March 2020      06  Financial Aid Notifications issued to incoming students for 2020-2021    15  Last day to submit Satisfactory Academic Progress Appeal for spring 2020    April 2020      01  Financial Aid Notifications for the summer 2020 semester begin to be available online    17  Last day to submit outstanding documents for spring 2020    May 2020      01  Last day to accept Financial Aid Notifications and sign promissory notes for spring    08  Spring 2020 semester ends    15  Annual Satisfactory Academic Progress review and students notified accordingly of financial aid eligibility for summer 2020 and fall 2020 terms    18  4-week summer session instruction begins    18  First summer 2020 disbursement for students enrolled in session 1    20  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class (4‐week summer 2020 session)    21  Last day to submit outstanding documents for the 4-week summer 2020 session    June 2020      01  2020‐21 Financial Aid Notifications for continuing students begin to be available online    01  Last day to submit Satisfactory Academic Progress Appeal for summer 2020 semester    05  Last day to accept Financial Aid Notifications and sign promissory notes for summer 2020    12  4-week summer 2020 session ends    15  First summer 2020 disbursement for student enrolled in session 2    15  Classes begin for 8‐week summer 2020 session    19  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class (8‐week summer 2020 session)    28  Summer 2020 tuition bill due in full    July 2020      01  Fall 2020 tuition assessments issued    01  2020-21 Health Professions (HPSL) Verification Worksheet submission deadline  (Colleges of Dentistry and  Pharmacy)    17  Last day to submit outstanding documents for the 8-week summer 2020 session    24  Last day to accept Financial Aid Notifications and sign promissory notes for summer 2020    August 2020      01  Students must submit all documents to receive full consideration for need-based institutional funds for 2020-21    07  8‐week summer 2020 session ends.    14  First financial aid disbursement to student accounts for fall 2020 semester    18  First refunds for students with aid exceeding university charges for fall 2020    24  Classes begin for fall 2020 semester    September 2020      04  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class (fall 2020 semester)    28  Fall 2020 bill is due    October 2020      01  2021-2022 FAFSA available at www.fafsa.ed.gov    15  Last day to submit Satisfactory Academic Progress Appeal for fall 2020 semester    November 2020      01  Spring 2021 Financial Aid Notifications begin to be available for incoming students    01  Priority FAFSA filing deadline for incoming students interested in the Aim High (Chancellor’s Fellows) scholarship program    13  Last day to submit any outstanding documents for fall 2020    27  Last day to accept Financial Aid Notifications and sign promissory notes for fall 2020    December 2020      11  Fall 2020 semester ends.           2019 SFAS Calendar        2019 SFAS Calendar       January 2019      04  First financial aid disbursement of Spring 2019    07  First refund of Spring 2019    14  Classes begin for spring 2019 semester    25  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class for spring 2018    February 2019      15  Priority FAFSA filing deadline 2019-2020– students who submit by this date will receive full consideration for all state and institutional grants    28  Spring 2018 bill due in full for students without payment plans    March 2019      08  Award letters for the 2019-2020 year begin to be available online to new students    15  Last day to submit Satisfactory Academic Progress Appeal for spring 2019    April 2019      n/a  Financial Aid Awards for the summer 2019 semester begin to be available online    19  Last day to submit outstanding documents for the spring 2019    May 2019      01  Last day to accept financial aid awards and sign promissory notes for spring 2019    10  Spring 2019 semester ends    17  Annual Satisfactory Academic Progress review and students notified accordingly of financial aid eligibility for summer 2019 and fall 2019 terms    20  4-week summer session instruction begins    21  First summer 2019 disbursement for students enrolled in session 1    22  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class (4‐week summer 2019 session)    24  Last day to submit outstanding documents for the 4-week summer 2019 session    June 2019      n/a  Financial Aid Awards for the 2019‐20 academic year begin to be available online    01  Last day to submit Satisfactory Academic Progress Appeal for summer 2019 semester    01  Last day to accept financial aid awards and sign promissory notes for summer 2019    07  First summer 2019 disbursement for student enrolled in session 2    14  4‐week summer 2019 session ends    17  Classes begin for 8‐week summer 2019 session    21  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class (8‐week summer 2019 session)    28  Summer 2019 tuition bill due in full    July 2019      01  Students must submit all documents to receive full consideration for need-based institutional funds for the 2019-20 year    01  Last day to submit Health Professions Verification Worksheet for College of Dentistry   and College of Pharmacy students for the 2019‐20 academic year.    01  Preferred deadline to accept 2019-2020 financial aid awards and complete requirements such as promissory notes, loan counseling, etc.    19  Last day to submit outstanding documents for the 8-week summer 2019 session    26  Last day to accept financial aid awards and sign promissory notes for summer 2019    August 2019      09  8‐week summer 2019 session ends.    16  First financial aid disbursement to students' account for fall 2019 semester    20  First refunds for students with aid exceeding university charges for fall 2019    26  Classes begin for fall 2019 semester    September 2019      06  Last day to complete late registration or drop a class (fall 2019 semester)    28  Fall 2019 tuition bill due in full for students without payment plans    October 2019      01  2020-2021 FAFSA available at www.fafsa.ed.gov    15  Last day to submit Satisfactory Academic Progress Appeal for fall 2019 semester    November 2019      n/a  Financial Aid Awards begin to be available for students attending spring 2020 only    01  Priority FAFSA filing deadline for students interested in the Aim High (Chancellor’s Fellows) scholarship program    15  Last day to submit any outstanding documents for fall 2019    29  Last day to accept financial aid awards and sign promissory notes for fall 2019    December 2019      13  Fall 2019 semester ends.
